blogPost.excerpt: Amigos is a hand-drawn illustration library excellent for creating infinite compositions! Be one of the first to test out these doodles exclusively with Blush Pro.
blogPost.body: Amigos is a hand-drawn illustration library excellent for creating infinite compositions! Be one of the first to test out these doodles exclusively with Blush Pro.
blogPost.title: Amigos - Customizable illustrations for any project
blogPost.author: Pablo Stanley

localize.description: Amigos是一个手绘插画库，非常适合创作无限的作品! 成为第一批试用这些Blush Pro专属涂鸦的人。
localize.tagline: 可为任何项目定制插图

localize.description: Amigos是一個手繪插畫庫，非常適合創作無限的作品! 成爲第一批試用這些Blush Pro專屬塗鴉的人。
localize.tagline: 可爲任何項目定製插圖

previous.excerpt: Waterful is a fresh take on water reminder apps. With multiple healthy challenges to take, friendly notifications to follow & our cute octopus to keep you company, staying hydrated becomes fun.
previous.title: Waterful - Turn daily hydration into a fun habit

localize.description: Waterful是一个新鲜的水提醒应用程序。有了多种健康的挑战，友好的通知和我们可爱的章鱼陪伴你，保持水分变得有趣。
localize.tagline: 将日常补水变成一种有趣的习惯

localize.description: Waterful是一個新鮮的水提醒應用程序。有了多種健康的挑戰，友好的通知和我們可愛的章魚陪伴你，保持水分變得有趣。
localize.tagline: 將日常補水變成一種有趣的習慣

next.excerpt: Get a living snapshot of all your analytics. Just copy and paste a single line of code to your Website or App and, within minutes, all your events will be monitored and automatically added to your tracking plan.
next.title: Trackingplan - Monitor your analytics without the hassle

localize.description: 获取您所有分析的动态快照。只需复制并粘贴一行代码到您的网站或应用程序中，在几分钟内，您的所有活动将被监控并自动添加到您的跟踪计划中。
localize.tagline: 轻松监控您的分析结果

localize.description: 獲取您所有分析的動態快照。只需複製並粘貼一行代碼到您的網站或應用程序中，在幾分鐘內，您的所有活動將被監控並自動添加到您的跟蹤計劃中。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆監控您的分析結果
